name: Ghost Town (itch) (yomiparis)
description:
My name is Paris, and I like to make games in my free time. One of those games is Ghost Town, a puzzle-adventure game created with GB Studio. Although I'm excited to show off the game, I must note that it's still in development! So, with that said, today I present to you a demo of Ghost Town for Windows, Mac, and Linux. This demo includes the first act of the game, with a runtime of approximately 45-60 minutes. If you would like to follow the development of the game, you can find me on Twitter. Feel free to say hi.

Controls

Ghost Town can be played with either the arrow keys or WASD. The full controls are as follows:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD: Move
  • Z or J: Select / Interact
  • X or K: Back
  • Enter: Start
  • Tab: Toggle Fullscreen
Notice

Ghost Town is purely a hobby project, and is not an officially licensed title for any handheld/home console. This game is made with love and out of admiration of the classic consoles and games of my childhood. Also, this build of the game uses nw.js to run as a self-contained executable, hence the somewhat large file size. I will work to reduce this bloat in future releases. With that said, enjoy the game, and thanks for checking it out.
